meanings.definition: Christophine: A tropical vine grown for its edible tuberous root.
meanings.sent1: In the garden, the christophine vine climbed up the trellis.
meanings.sent2: My grandmother cooked a delicious stew with christophine as the main ingredient.
meanings.sent3: The christophine tried to hide among the other vegetables in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The christophine's roots reached deep into the earth, seeking nourishment.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green leaves of the christophine plant swayed in the breeze.

meanings.definition: Christophine: The tuberous root of the christophine plant, used as a vegetable in cooking.
meanings.sent1: I dug up a fresh christophine from the garden for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The christophine added a unique flavor to the stir-fry dish.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat batted the christophine around the kitchen floor.
meanings.sent4: The christophine's smooth skin hid the delicious flesh inside.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the cooking christophine filled the house with warmth.
